name: Fruit Picker Apron
description:
## Fruit Picker Apron

Whether you're a professional fruit picker or just enjoy picking fruit as a hobby, this apron is a must-have accessory

### Bumpkins.io

Go to bumpkins.io to equip this collectible to your Bumpkin NFT

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
